entry.title: New release for WhoDB: 0.49.0 - Release - Anthropic fixes, UI dropdown changes
entry.content:
Generated By Clidey's Auto GitHub Release

‚ú® Improvements

Anthropic Integration - more models: - The Anthropic integration has been updated with the latest models offered by the Anthropic API! Token count is set to max for each. üòä

Updates to saving and deleting:
- You should now be able to delete and update rows in a table without a primary key. Be careful - it will do a blanket where on all of the unchanged values, so it could result in duplicate changes or issues. As usual, we recommend having a primary key for this kind of stuff! ü™â

Longer dropdowns:
- Dropdowns now have a bigger maximum height so that they do not feel as cramped. üíÖ

üêõ Bug Fixes

Anthropic Integration - changes to the HTTP API - Originally the Anthropic HTTP API streamed data but now it looks like it has changed to a single response per request. We've updated it to accommodate that.

Dependabot updates - Updated several dependencies üîß

Thank you to everyone who contributed to this release! üöÄ
Your feedback and support are invaluable.

What's Changed

  • build(deps): bump github.com/99designs/gqlgen from 0.17.68 to 0.17.70 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/407
  • build(deps): bump posthog-js from 1.235.6 to 1.236.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/411
  • build(deps-dev): bump autoprefixer from 10.4.20 to 10.4.21 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/410
  • build(deps): bump react-router-dom from 7.4.0 to 7.5.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/409
  • build(deps): bump posthog-js from 1.236.0 to 1.236.1 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/415
  • build(deps): bump github.com/vektah/gqlparser/v2 from 2.5.23 to 2.5.24 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/414
  • build(deps-dev): bump @parcel/transformer-webmanifest from 2.13.3 to 2.14.4 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/416
  • build(deps): bump @codemirror/view from 6.36.2 to 6.36.5 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/417
  • build(deps-dev): bump @tailwindcss/postcss from 4.0.16 to 4.1.4 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/412
  • build(deps-dev): bump parcel from 2.13.3 to 2.14.4 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/408
  • build(deps-dev): bump tailwindcss from 4.1.3 to 4.1.4 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/422
  • build(deps-dev): bump cypress from 14.2.1 to 14.3.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/420
  • build(deps): bump @reduxjs/toolkit from 2.5.0 to 2.7.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/418
  • build(deps): bump posthog-js from 1.236.1 to 1.236.2 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/426
  • build(deps): bump tailwind-merge from 3.0.2 to 3.2.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/427
  • Ah/bugfix/anthropic integration by @modelorona in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/433
  • build(deps): bump react-markdown from 9.0.3 to 10.1.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/432
  • build(deps): bump framer-motion from 12.6.3 to 12.7.4 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/431
  • build(deps): bump react-router-dom from 7.5.0 to 7.5.1 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/430
  • build(deps): bump @apollo/client from 3.13.5 to 3.13.8 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/428
  • build(deps): bump github.com/vektah/gqlparser/v2 from 2.5.24 to 2.5.25 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/425

entry.title: New release for WhoDB: 0.51.0 - Release - Postgres Profile Fix, Database Port Defaults, Driver Updates
entry.content:
Generated By Clidey's Auto GitHub Release

‚ú® Improvements

Database Port Defaults: - Before this version, WhoDB would default to 3306 if no port was given in the advanced config section. This is a MySQL-specific default and didn't make sense for the others. So now based on your database type, it will use that specific default. üòä

üêõ Bug Fixes

Postgres Profile Fix - Postgres profile would break as it was not updated to use the new parsed connection object. This would cause extra parameters to be added and the connection would fail. That's now sorted. üíÖ

Dependabot updates - Updated several dependencies including driver updates, so if you run into any issues, please let us know! üîß

Thank you to everyone who contributed to this release! üöÄ
Your feedback and support are invaluable.

What's Changed

  • build(deps): bump github.com/99designs/gqlgen from 0.17.70 to 0.17.71 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/440
  • build(deps-dev): bump cypress from 14.3.0 to 14.3.1 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/439
  • build(deps): bump @codemirror/state from 6.5.1 to 6.5.2 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/438
  • build(deps-dev): bump postcss from 8.4.49 to 8.5.3 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/437
  • add specific port defaults based on db time, fix postgres profile bug‚Ä¶ by @modelorona in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/441
  • build(deps): bump github.com/elastic/go-elasticsearch/v8 from 8.16.0 to 8.18.0 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/424
  • build(deps): bump github.com/ClickHouse/ch-go from 0.61.5 to 0.65.0 in /core in the go_modules group by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/403
  • build(deps): bump github.com/ClickHouse/clickhouse-go/v2 from 2.30.0 to 2.34.0 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/394
  • build(deps): bump go.mongodb.org/mongo-driver from 1.17.1 to 1.17.3 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/366

Full Changelog: https://github.com/clidey/whodb/compare/0.50.0...0.51.0

entry.title: New release for WhoDB: 0.52.0 - Release - Houdini configuration using docker env, several UI improvements including escape key handling and chat autofocus
entry.content:
Generated By Clidey's Auto GitHub Release

‚ú® Improvements

OpenAI, Anthropic, and Ollama configuration with Docker environmental variables: - Now you can add your OpenAI and Anthropic keys using environmental variables in Docker. WhoDB will automatically load these profiles up. If you experience any issues with seeing your profiles, please clear your cache/application storage! üòä

Escape key handling for the Where conditions + Add Row button - Now when you open up either the Add Row or Where condition options, if you have not added or selected anything, pressing Escape or clicking outside of it will automatically close it. If you have added something, it will keep it open. üìñ

Houdini chat auto-focus - The chat box should automatically be in focus whenever you go into Houdini. üö°

üêõ Bug Fixes

No more empty Where clauses - Previously you could add a Where clause without having selected any of the options on the UI. This is not possible anymore. üíÖ

Update the Postgres query that gets the row count - This new query should be more stable in getting your row count. Please keep in mind that somethings these results are inaccurate and if you have configured your database without analysis, it may fail. We avoid doing full-count queries as that can be taxing and slow. ü¶•

Dependabot updates - Updated several dependencies including driver updates, so if you run into any issues, please let us know! üîß

Thank you to everyone who contributed to this release! üöÄ
Your feedback and support are invaluable.

What's Changed

  • build(deps-dev): bump cypress from 14.3.1 to 14.3.2 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/447
  • build(deps): bump framer-motion from 12.7.4 to 12.8.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/446
  • changes to ai by @modelorona in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/448
  • build(deps): bump posthog-js from 1.236.5 to 1.236.6 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/452

Full Changelog: https://github.com/clidey/whodb/compare/0.51.0...0.52.0

entry.title: New release for WhoDB: 0.53.0 - Release - Improvements to the Houdini Chat experience
entry.content:
Generated By Clidey's Auto GitHub Release

‚ú® Improvements

UI/UX changes to the chat: - A little polishing! üòä

üêõ Bug Fixes

AI Model loading - The AI integrations sometimes wouldn't load models unless you refreshed the page. This should now be sorted üíÖ

Chat autofocus - Chat autofocus now autofocuses once you get a response back. ü¶•

Dependabot updates - Updated several dependencies including driver updates, so if you run into any issues, please let us know! üîß

Thank you to everyone who contributed to this release! üöÄ
Your feedback and support are invaluable.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/clidey/whodb/compare/0.52.0...0.53.0
